docs.title: Actions
docs.text:
Collection of compostite actions

name description docs example workflow status Greeting Greeting docs greeting_action.yml MSBuild Build .NET solution with MSBuild docs msbuild_action.yml Notify Slack Send notification to Slack docs notify_slack_action.yml NPM Build Build a Node.js project docs npm_build_action.yml Sync Repo Sync Repository docs sync_repo_action.yml

More info:

  • Creating a composite action
  • Wiki

docs.title: Creating action
docs.text:
• Read the doc on Creating a composite action.
  • Create your action.
  • Add an example workflow in .github/workflows

  • Generate action/README.md

    Run ./utils/generate_docs.sh <action> to generate action/README.md

  • Generate README.md

    Run ./utils/generate_readme.sh to generate README.md

More info:

  • Wiki

docs.title: Greeting
docs.text: Greeting

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
name: Greeting
uses: DynamoDS/actions/greeting@master
with:
  # Add inputs here

docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Default Required message Message World false

docs.title: Outputs
docs.text: Name Description number Random number

docs.title: Build .NET solution with MSBuild
docs.text: Build .NET solution with MSBuild

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
name: Build .NET solution with MSBuild
uses: DynamoDS/actions/msbuild@master
with:
  # Add inputs here

docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Default Required repository Repository true dotnet_version Dotnet Version 8.0.x false solution_path Solution Path true build_configuration Build Configuration Release false additional_arguments Additional Arguments false

docs.title: Send notification to Slack
docs.text: Send notification to Slack

docs.title: Setup
docs.text: • The Dynamo Notification app must be added to the slack channel beforehand.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
name: Send notification to Slack
uses: DynamoDS/actions/notify_slack@master
with:
  # Add inputs here

docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Default Required channel_id Slack Channel id or name C0P46V3A8 false slack_bot_token Slack Bot Token true include_commit_info Include commit information in slack notification false false include_custom_message Include custom message in slack notification false false custom_status Custom status to use in slack notification false custom_message Custom message to include in slack notification false

docs.title: Setup
docs.text: • The Dynamo Notification app must be added to the slack channel beforehand.

docs.title: Build a Node.js project
docs.text: Build a Node.js project

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
name: Build a Node.js project
uses: DynamoDS/actions/npm_build@master
with:
  # Add inputs here

docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Default Required repository Repository true node_version Node Version 20 false shell Shell bash false

docs.title: Sync Repository
docs.text: Sync Repository

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
• The downstream repository must be created beforehand.
  • The runner must be configured to have push access to the downstream repository.

More info on runner setup and repository configuration is on Wiki

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
name: Sync Repository
uses: DynamoDS/actions/sync_repo@master
with:
  # Add inputs here

docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Default Required upstream_repository Upstream Repository true downstream_repository_url Downstream Repository true github_event Github Event true

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
• The downstream repository must be created beforehand.
  • The runner must be configured to have push access to the downstream repository.

More info on runner setup and repository configuration is on Wiki
